metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5697 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Ruby-saml before 1.3.0 allows attackers to perform XML signature wrapping attacks via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-5697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-saml - 1.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-1').
